title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Identity: User activity timeline in Microsoft 365 Defender

description.newValue:
,Using the activity timeline from the Microsoft Defender for Identity portal as inspiration, this release will provide a dedicated tab on the user page in Microsoft 365 Defender that contains a full user activity timeline, detailing all activities and alerts from relevant workloads, associate dot that identity.
GA date: December CY2022
Preview date: November CY2022
